snippet.title: Dragon Age™: The Veilguard | Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
For good or ill, the fate of Thedas will be decided soon. Dragon Age™: The Veilguard arrives October 31, 2024. Pre-order* to receive Rook's Blood Dragon armor cosmetic for all three classes: Warrior, Mage, and Rogue.
 
Ancient tyrants wielding the might of gods have escaped their prison, and that is only the beginning. Demons, darkspawn, blighted dragons, and perilous choices lie ahead. Unite the Veilguard and defy the gods.
 
Follow us on:
 
X: https://www.twitter.com/dragonage 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonAge
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dragonagegame
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@dragonagegame
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@electronicarts
Tumblr: https://www.tumblr.com/bioware
Discord: Discord.gg/BioWare
 
*Conditions & restrictions apply. See ea.com/games/dragon-age/dragon-age-the-veilguard/disclaimers for details.
